summary:
Use my knowledge and experience in multiple settings to attain social beneficial targets. Contribute to the scientific knowledge base within the multi-dimensional fields of economics, management, automation, work processes and thereto-related backgrounds. Inform and entertain people with the modern communication tools that are available these days.

Specialties: System Administration (the IT-guy), Infrastructure and Management (the IT-manager) & System Analysis (the Smart-IT-guy)... But without joking: worked mainly as an IT-engineer in two fields: Logistics and the Semi-Governmental sector...

For a long time the wish to finish my Computer Engineering degree (of which only the final thesis remains) was there. No more though. After experiencing the negative side of the Dutch education system; I wholly thank all the teachers that had a positive impact on my education, but thank for recognition from a system that protects the bad teachers therein. Just so you know.

profile_positions.description:
Promote interests of individuals and collectives. This by keeping counsel, giving advice and if requested promoting these interests in regards to third parties.

Characterization of these works: 1) Often on a confidential basis, 2) Frequently aimed at collective interests, 3) As an expert within my primary field, 4) As an expert by experience outside of my primary field & 5) Often to great success.

Based on my experiences and knowledge from my studies, private studies and life in general, people and special interest groups come to me for advice and assistance. In a varying number of fields I'm able to accommodate them, among these: IT/telecom, healthcare industry, public housing sector, social welfare, (international) student issues, work/employer relations and et cetera. This with a high level of professionalism and ethics, multiple point-of-view interpretation of facts, an eye for historical geopolitical issues and the fundamental discussion of underlying facts/issues/problems.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Counsellor

profile_positions.description: With a couple of hundred videos published the process of video production is a very interesting one. One's creative skills resulting in a real product, independently created from others. Yet with real and sometimes even unreal feedback from subscribers and others. And although it denotes (as per the terms) no real association: I am a YouTube Partner.
profile_positions.title: YouTuber

profile_positions.description:
On-call and substitute cleaner (with full satisfaction of end-customers) for ISS Cleanings Services at the following locations: nMI (Nederlands Meet Instituut), Festo, All Seas (all in Delft), BPRC (Biomedical Primate Research Centre) and TNO Rijswijk (last two in Rijswijk).

Work included a.o.: General Cleaning, Office Cleaning, Foor & Beverage Cleaning and Specialty Cleaning (Cleanrooms and shower & wachinerooms).
profile_positions.title: General Cleaner

profile_positions.description: Essentially a political campaign stretched out over two election rounds during which: 1) a team of representative candidates from a number of housing complexes was assembled, 2) support from inhabitants was gathered (first round would have been won with 128 votes, second round support was over 300 votes) 3) public speaking to individuals, groups & external organisations (press), 4) writing and publication of campaign materials (both neutral information and point-of-view campaign op-adds) & 5) managing our online presents (mainly using a Facebook-page to great success) and influencing those of others.
profile_positions.title: Candidate President and Chairman of the Board of Directors

profile_positions.description: Full-Time Student at the Technische Hogeschool Rijswijk, which was merged with the Haagse Hogeschool. Of this poly-technical study only the final thesis remains.
profile_positions.title: Full-Time Student

profile_positions.description:
Ensuing the dismissal of the board of directors (which was in disarray because of enactment of “campus contract” housing legislation in Dutch law), the general assembly elected me as “Organiser” (effectively Director “ad-interim” and thereby acting on behalf of the General Assembly).

Work included a.o.: organising tenant General Assembly meetings, speaking on behalf of the General Assembly in relation to Duwo (the Landlord) and managing and directing the administrative employee.
profile_positions.title: Organiser (chairman General Assembly)

profile_positions.description:
Ahold N.V. Geldermalsen
Part-time System Administrator at the centralised IT Helpdesk for the logistics branch of Albert Heijn

With the (then recent) reorganisation of the IT support staff within Ahold N.V. a centralised support department was raised for the four regional and two national distribution centres within the distribution organisation. Activities and responsibilities where identical to the earlier position as Systeembeheerder (System Administrator) at Albert Heijn Distributie Centrum in Pijnacker. In addition there was support for a new inventory management system (online transaction processing instead of batch processing and this to implement the just-in-time methodology), the local paternoster-carousel-order-pick-robotics-system and a multitude of other unique systems.

Because of the consequences of a car accident and decreasing departmental responsibilities I decided to hand in my resignation and focus myself on my study.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Albert Heijn Distributie Centrum Pijnacker
Part-time System Administrator at the IT department

Activities included (among others): end user support and securing dataflow within and to the distribution centre. Depending on the specific systems one could call this: first, second or third level support and the coordination of incidents and service requests with external parties. Depending on the specific shift this was done independently or as a team effort, but was always aimed at guarantying end users with means and data to enable them to prepare deliveries to stores correctly and on time. Projects were aimed at furthering internal processes and creating means to do so. A description of the technical environment would be a mixed environment: standard Microsoft based systems for office automation, IBM mainframe, soft- and hardware mainframe clients and SunOS for corporate activities and data processing, but also Symbol hand terminals for a barcode system used when gathering products for an order and it’s delivery.

During this period there was an opportunity to attend a first-aid training course and a following corporate emergency services training course. Both were successfully completed and integrated into the regular activities (including safety officer panel meetings).
profile_positions.title: System Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Albert Heijn Distributie Centrum Pijnacker
Two month internship at the IT department

Project description was the indexation of knowledge levels within the department, development of strategic policies in regards to the retention and extension of those levels and the development of tools to enable knowledge retention and extension.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator (Internship)

profile_positions.description:
Albert Heijn Distributie Centrum Pijnacker
Part-time inventory and inventory system controller at the groceries department

Activities included (among others) correcting inventory levels in the administration systems, noting discrepancies/problems and reporting to the inventory manager.

Within these activities there was an opportunity to attend a stihl- and reachtruck course of which I availed myself.
profile_positions.title: Quantity Controller

profile_positions.description:
Albert Heijn Distributie Centrum Pijnacker
Active for a period of five months

Activities included (among others) archival work in regards to invoices, resolution of administrative problems and discrepancies in regards to deliveries (including the detection and investigation of fraud), tactical management of line departments and warehouse administrators in regards to policies on deliveries and stocks, preparing and management of shipments of pre-selected products for quality inspections & testing and when required helping (expediting) the recall and destruction of (defective) products.
profile_positions.title: Replacement Supply Manager

profile_positions.description:
Because of a non-representative tenant-committee, another complex inhabitant and myself organised (in good dialog with Duwo) new tenant-committee candidates and a representative election for our instatement.

Work included a.o.: organising meetings, introduction of candidates to “tenant-committee membership” and organising the election.
profile_positions.title: Re-founding member of the Tenant-committee

profile_positions.description:
Four month internship at: IBM Business Consulting Services
Location: Rijswijk ZH

In light of the (then) recent takeover of PricewaterhouseCoopers Consulting, the project description was: study and recommend the possibilities and implications (both technical and organisational) for attaining (according to IBM norms and standards) official internal certification for the corporate infrastructure. In addition activities were aimed (among others) at supporting the daily activities at this (office) location, create an information requirement analysis as preparation of a rollout of new clients at this (office) location, participate in the team which was effecting the rollout of new clients, configure clients according to specific requirements, maintenance of a number of servers and peripheral appliances (incl. usage of then unused service contracts), but also the temporary replacement of the department head and the training of a new colleague.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator (Internship)

profile_positions.description:
Part time pizza deliveryman in the “Haaglanden” area.

Work included planning of routes for cons-equal deliveries to multiple customers, carrying out those deliveries and clean up of food-prep and baking accessories at closing.
profile_positions.title: Pizza deliveryman and support worker

profile_positions.location: The Hague, Delft, Rijswijk and Voorburg
profile_positions.description:
Parttime and on-call cleaner at (a.o.) the following locations: Vroom & Dreesman Rijswijk and The Hague (location Grote Marktstraat), Nuon Office in Delft, the ISS Regional Office in Rijswijk en an incidental specialty cleaning of the Capgeminni Parkeergarage in Voorburg.

Work included mainly general Office Cleaning, Food & Beverage Cleaning and incidental Specialty Cleaning (incl. mechanical appliances).
profile_positions.title: General Cleaner
